item.name: UNICONFIG: replace config with operational xr

request.description:
Replaces intended (CONF DS) uniconfig topology with actual (OPER DS) uniconfig topology.

This is usually used after RPC sync-from-network so we have same state in CONF DS and OPER DS.

Calculates difference between intended (CONF DS) uniconfig topology and actual (OPER DS) uniconfig topology.

Result describes diff from intended uniconfig topology point of view.

item.name: SNAPSHOT: replace config with snapshot created xr loopback

request.description:
Replaces intended (CONF DS) uniconfig topology with snapshot topology.

This is used when we want to manully rollback to some state in the past.

Usually RPC commit is called afterwards.

Calculates difference between intended (CONF DS) uniconfig topology and actual (OPER DS) uniconfig topology.

Result describes diff from intended uniconfig topology point of view.
